messages.title: Vote Victoria Groulef on 7th May for:
messages.content:
AN ACCESSIBLE MP: knocking on your doors all year round and holding at least five surgeries a month across the constituency. You’ll always know where Victoria stands because she will always be around for you to ask her.
AN ACCOUNTABLE MP: regularly publishing information about her work on her website and putting newsletters with details of any expenses incurred through your letterboxes every three months.
AN INNOVATIVE MP: using new approaches, such as linking everyone setting up a new business with a business mentor who can provide them with the guidance they need.
A DETERMINED MP: putting all people, however the vote, at the very heart of everything she does to get the best for Reading West.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more doctors, GP appointments within 48 hours, Cancer tests and results within a week, Scrap the Tory Health and Social Care Act
50,000 more primary school places, Smaller primary school class sizes, Immediately scrap the Bedroom Tax, 25 hours of free childcare a week
A British Investment Bank to lend to small businesses, Cap rail fare increases, Cut business rates for small businesses, Raise the Minimum Wage to £8

issues.economy: A British Investment Bank to lend to small businesses, Cap rail fare increases, Cut business rates for small businesses, Raise the Minimum Wage to £8
issues.education: 50,000 more primary school places, Smaller primary school class sizes
issues.health: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more doctors, GP appointments within 48 hours, Cancer tests and results within a week, Scrap the Tory Health and Social Care Act
issues.socialWelfare: Immediately scrap the Bedroom Tax, 25 hours of free childcare a week

images.caption: Martin backs Victoria to be our next MP!
We're also backing Victoria to be our MP!
Vote Victoria Groulef on 7th May for: An accessible MP, An Accountable MP, An Innovative MP, A Determined MP.
